archetypes.name: Rigid Dogmatic Closed‑Minded Individual
archetypes.tagline: Order > Truth; Certainty at all costs
archetypes.summary: Defends fixed doctrines (religious, political, scientistic). Sees Resonance as threat to stability and identity.
archetypes.communication_style: Declarative, slogan‑heavy, low tolerance for caveats
archetypes.conversion_strategy: Bridge on shared values (order, dignity). Offer bounded pilots and crisp falsification tests.
archetypes.sample_quote: New forces? We have enough. Stop moving the goalposts.

archetypes.name: Musician/Artist‑Engineer
archetypes.summary: Performs/designs sound/visual systems; intuitively grasps entrainment and crowd dynamics.
archetypes.conversion_strategy: Co‑create citizen‑science concerts; publish evidence packs with hashes.
archetypes.sample_quote: If the crowd locks in, the room becomes one instrument.

archetypes.name: Diehard Skeptic (Evidence‑Forced)
archetypes.summary: Demands preregistration, controls, and null results. Will update if data compels.
archetypes.conversion_strategy: Offer prereg, publish nulls, invite oversight.
archetypes.sample_quote: Show me the effect size, then we talk.
